administrator:
{#c}
  {#y}Help{#c} - Available Commands:
  {#c}-> {#y}AdminCMD{#c}: moderation commands
       {#y}admincmd ban
       admincmd unban
  {#c}-> {#y}Dashboard{#c}: dashboard commands
       {#y}dashboard show
       dashboard services
       dashboard start
       dashboard stop
  {#c}-> {#y}Products{#c}: products commands
       {#y}products vps
       products vds
       products gameserver
  {#c}-> {#y}Cart{#c}: cart commands
       {#y}cart show
       cart add
       cart remove
       cart pay
  {#c}-> {#y}Users{#c}: user management
       {#y}users promote
       users demote
  {#c}-> {#y}Logs{#c}: View customer or system logs
  {#c}-> {#y}Tickets{#c}: ticket commands
       {#y}tickets show
       tickets reply
       tickets close
  {#c}-> {#y}Coupons{#c}: coupon commands
       {#y}coupon create
       coupon delete
       coupon show
  {#c}-> {#y}Balance{#c}: balance commands
       {#y}balance show
       balance add
  {#c}-> {#y}Logout{#c}: Log out of your account

guest:

  {#y}Help{#c}- Available Commands:

  {#c}-> {#y}Cart{#c}: cart tree commands
